official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to proposals to reduce benefits or cost-of-living adjustments under Social Security and other federally administered retirement programs.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no reduction in benefits or cost of living adjustments under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, under the Railroad Retirement Act, under any retirement system for Federal civilian employees, or under any retirement system for members of the uniformed services.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to proposals to reduce benefits or cost-of-living adjustments under Social Security and other federally administered retirement programs.
